attributes.action: Raise limit for contactless payments to avoid cross infection of Covid 19
attributes.additional_details: Most payments in these places are above £30, resulting in shared use of pinpad, and increased risk of infection.
attributes.background: Temporarily raise limit for contactless payments at food shops and petrol stations, to avoid cross infection of Covid 19.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the UK Government and Parliament aren't responsible for the issue you raise. The contactless payment limit is set by banks.

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here: 

www.gov.uk/coronavirus 

https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/ 

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
